questions.question: What idea do you believe, whether grounded in data or intuition, that many people you respect disagree with you on?
What's the benefit, what's the cost in terms of just bigger than business, but life, happiness, the pursuit of happiness?
How do you know an opportunity when you see one in terms of the one you wanna go big on?
Is it something that could be put down into code or is it still deeply human?
Can you elaborate as you have been on that idea, what do you hear about the world if you listen?
If you're creating this kind of initiative, which we need, where does the money come from?
Can I help people get to sort of a good outcome that'll stand any test?
